messages.message: If a user clicks onto an app from a smaller screen (mobile), we should completely block the view with a modal or screen saying to use a laptop. This looks bad when using a mobile and clicking onto an app
if user is on mobile we detect this and show a banner
@Udit did you miss the banner or didn't show up?
This is when I made my window on my laptop smaller. I either missed the banner or it didnt appear but I don't think the banner is enough when a user can just click onto an app and it looks broken
Fwiw this is what it looks like on mobile. Definitely could use some improvement but the banner shows up
